com.broadcom.bt.le.api
Class BleAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleAdapter

public class BleAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides helper functions and related constants to extend Bluetooth functionality for the Low Energy profile.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String ACTION_UUID
          Broadcast Action: This intent is used to broadcast the UUID wrapped as a android.os.ParcelUuid of the remote device after it has been fetched.
static byte DEVICE_TYPE_BLE
          Designates a remote device as a Bluetooth Low Energy (only) device.

          Identifies a remote Bluetooth device as type BR/EDR, not capable of accepting Bluetooth Low Energy connections.
static byte DEVICE_TYPE_DUMO
          Specifies a remote device is both capable of Bluetooth Low Energy as well as traditional Bluetooth HCI level communication.

Field Detail

ACTION_UUID

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_UUID
Broadcast Action: This intent is used to broadcast the UUID wrapped as a android.os.ParcelUuid of the remote device after it has been fetched. This intent is sent only when the UUIDs of the remote device are requested to be fetched using Service Discovery Protocol

Always contains the extra field EXTRA_DEVICE
Always contains the extra field EXTRA_UUID

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEVICE_TYPE_BLE

public static final byte DEVICE_TYPE_BLE
Designates a remote device as a Bluetooth Low Energy (only) device.

DEVICE_TYPE_BREDR

public static final byte DEVICE_TYPE_BREDR
Identifies a remote Bluetooth device as type BR/EDR, not capable of accepting Bluetooth Low Energy connections.

DEVICE_TYPE_DUMO

public static final byte DEVICE_TYPE_DUMO
Specifies a remote device is both capable of Bluetooth Low Energy as well as traditional Bluetooth HCI level communication.

EXTRA_DEVICE

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_DEVICE
Used as a Parcelable BluetoothDevice extra field in every intent broadcast by this class. It contains the BluetoothDevice that the intent applies to.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_DEVICE_TYPE

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_DEVICE_TYPE
Extra for the ACTION_FOUND intent specifying the type of the remote device.

See Also:
DEVICE_TYPE_BREDR, DEVICE_TYPE_BLE, DEVICE_TYPE_DUMO

EXTRA_UUID

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_UUID
Used as an extra field in ACTION_UUID intents, Contains the android.os.ParcelUuid's of the remote device which is a parcelable version of a UUID.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

BleAdapter

public BleAdapter()
Method Detail

getApiLevel

public static int getApiLevel()
Returns the current Open Bluetooth Low Energy SDK API level.

getDeviceType

public static byte getDeviceType(BluetoothDevice device)
Returns type of the Bluetooth device (LE, BR/EDR or dual-mode).

Parameters:
device - The remote device who's type is to be determined
Returns:
The type of the remote device
See Also:
DEVICE_TYPE_BREDR, DEVICE_TYPE_BLE, DEVICE_TYPE_DUMO

getRemoteServices

public static boolean getRemoteServices(java.lang.String deviceAddress)
Initiates Bluetooth service discovery on a remote device. The results of the service discovery are broadcast using the ACTION_UUID intent.

Parameters:
deviceAddress - Bluetooth address of the remote device in 00:11:22:33:44:55 format
Returns:
true if the device discovery was started successfully
